docs.text: Welcome to Abstract Algebra Course ¶ This website dedicated for Abstract Algebra taught in sememster I for the course of MA/MSc in Mathematics in TMBU, Bhagalpur. Prequesite ¶ This course presumes the knowledge of groups, ring, field and some knowledge of vector space is also needed. Syllabus ¶ Group action and Sylow theorem Series of subgroups Integral Domains Extension Fieds Modules Insolvability of equation Objectives ¶ Application of Group Action Use it prove sylow theorems Application of Sylow Theorem to study small groups PID and ED Understand different kinds of field extension Studying Modules To know that why equation of degree can't have a formula for roots Routine ¶ Weekday 1st Period 2nd Period 3rd Period 4th Period 5th Period 6th Period MON AA TUE AA WED AA THR AA FRI AA SAT AA Reference ¶ Instructor ¶ Sandeep Suman, Assistant Professor, University Department of Mathematics
